metadata.title: CVE-2021-29972 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free vulnerability was found via testing, and traced to anout-of-date Cairo library. Updating the library resolved the issue, and mayhave remediated other, unknown security vulnerabilities as well. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 90.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
